alert.note: Alert for Marathon; Shawano (Wisconsin) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS GreenBay (East Central Wisconsin - Green Bay)
info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued February 21 at 4:28AM CST until February 22 at 9:00PM CST by NWS GreenBay
info.description: ...PROLONGED PERIOD OF WINTRY PRECIPITATION EXPECTED ACROSS THE AREA... ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY NOW IN EFFECT FROM 5 PM THIS AFTERNOON TO 9 PM CST TUESDAY... * WHAT...Snow expected. Total snow accumulations between 3 and 6 inches. * WHERE...Marathon and Shawano Counties. * WHEN...From 5 PM this afternoon to 9 PM CST Tuesday. * IMPACTS...Travel could be difficult at times. The hazardous conditions could impact the commutes Monday evening through Tuesday evening. Areas of blowing snow could reduce visibility. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...This will be a long duration event. Lulls or breaks in the precipitation are expected at times.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. The latest road conditions for the state you are calling from can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.
